title: MoU Signed Between Lunate and IHC to Explore Ghaf Benefits Enrollment
description: Lunate, an Abu Dhabi-based global investment manager, signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with International Holding Company (IHC) to explore enrolling IHC and its portfolio companies in Lunate's Ghaf Benefits plan. Ghaf Benefits is an Alternative End-of-Service Benefits fund platform launched by Lunate under the UAE's Voluntary Alternative End-of-Service Benefits Scheme. It offers employees potential investment returns on their end-of-service gratuities and simplifies benefits management for employers. The fund provides six investment options, including conventional and Shariah-compliant funds. IHC, the most valuable holding company in the Middle East with over 1,200 subsidiaries across sectors such as technology, healthcare, financial services, and real estate, plans to extend these benefits to its employees and portfolio companies to enhance financial security and workplace innovation.
tags: Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation
source_name: International Holding Company (IHC) signs MoU with Lunate to join Ghaf Benefits

opportunities.title: Third-Party Payroll Providers Integration with Ghaf Benefits Platform
opportunities.description: Payroll service companies can integrate their systems with the Ghaf Benefits platform to automate contributions, reporting, and compliance for clients who adopt the Alternative End-of-Service Benefits Scheme. This would streamline HR processes for employers, particularly SMEs adopting the scheme, and could increase market access for payroll providers.
roadmap_steps: Analyze Ghaf Benefits API and data requirements
Contact Lunate for technical documentation and partnership
Develop and test integration modules
Market the integrated solution to employers adopting Ghaf Benefits
Provide training and support for clients

opportunities.title: Financial Wellness Apps Offering Ghaf Benefits Portfolio Tracking
opportunities.description: Financial wellness app developers can create modules allowing users enrolled in Ghaf Benefits to track and optimize their end-of-service fund investments, receive personalized advice on fund selection, and plan future withdrawals. The cooperation could boost user engagement and differentiate the apps in the UAE benefits space.
roadmap_steps: Explore Ghaf Benefits user access protocols
Partner with Lunate for data-sharing agreements
Build secure data pipelines and UX modules
Pilot the feature with HR teams or directly with users
Iterate and market for widespread adoption

opportunities.title: Wellness and Engagement Platforms Bundling Ghaf Benefits Education Modules

opportunities.title: Real Estate Developers Accepting Ghaf-linked Advances for Staff Housing
opportunities.description: Real estate developers can collaborate with employers to accept Ghaf Benefits-linked advances (anticipated gratuity payouts) as down payments or rent guarantees for employees, thereby unlocking new segments of homebuyers/renters in the UAE and innovating corporate housing benefits.
roadmap_steps: Assess regulatory viability with MOHRE
Design advance/guarantee mechanics with Lunate
Engage major employers for pilot schemes
Market offerings to relevant employee segments
Monitor uptake and adjust strategy
